comments.body: I think this needs updating to `https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/`

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: Also, `aka.ms/powershell` points to `https://docs.microsoft.com/en-gb/powershell/` which is _better_ but weird that it points to an EN-GB page specifically instead of detecting the user's language or region.

comments.body: Weird. I'll have to check what's funky with my region settings, heh. Thanks, fellas. :)
